Summary: Went to see what my dog was barking at. out of the corner of my eye I seen something big an bright in the sky. It was moving slow,and had a wobble. There was no sound at all. It was moving from southwest to northeast. Stayed a bright white never changed.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my bed room watching TV when I heard my Dog outside barking like there was something out there. So I go to the kitchen window, and look out at him. He stop barking, and was looking at me ,and wagging his tail. Then out of the corner of my right eye. I see something bright in the sky. At a glance I thought it was venues. Then I look again, and seen it was bigger than venues would be, an I notice it was moving. So I run an got my binoculars, an went outside. It was moving from southwest to northeast. I watch it for about 5 min. It stayed a bright white the whole time. It also had a wobble to it. thru the binoculars it look like it had a aura around it. IT had no sound to it. Lost sight of it too many tree's.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Gadsden
There were no other sightings in Gadsden on or around June 3rd 2013
